snippet.title: Flight Simulator - Xbox Trailer | Game Awards 2020
snippet.description:
Fly the friendly (and gorgeous) skies as this previously PC-only series lands on console for the first time, coming exclusively to Xbox in summer 2021.

#ign #TheGameAwards2020
